messages.name: anosleepbel
messages.content:
Okay, so I got an adhd diagnosis, thank you guys for your help - now does anyone know how get adhd meds aka actually treated?

I do wanna do it properly with a psychiatrist but public insurance appointments are nowhere to be found?
I looked at 116117, doctolib and Jameda
I also looked it up on Reddit and it seems pretty hopeless cause they need to be specialized for adhd on top?
I even got the urgency code 

Prio 1: how do I get vyvanse asap in the meantime? (I already tried it and it helped like day and night + talked about it with my GP. I also nerded myself so deep into the topic that I feel confident to bridge the gap until a psychiatrist appointment myself) (or something similar if not possible) 
Prio 2: how do I get an appointment at all? (Ideally <1 yearâ€¦.)

Does anyone know anything / know where to ask? 
Feeling pretty overwhelmed right now, as the adhd is also impacting my ability to work at all, so thatâ€™s super stressful

messages.name: Britta
messages.content:
Go to a "psychiatrische Institutsambulanz" (Pia) at a hospital close to you. I know someone who got his first ritalin prescription at the PIA linked below. But it might depend on where you live.I think ritalin cannot be prescribed by every Hausarzt. Of course that's not the only treatment option though 

https://www.alexianer-berlin-hedwigkliniken.de/st-hedwig-krankenhaus/leistungen/ambulante-behandlung/psychiatrische-institutsambulanzen-pia/psychiatrische-institutsambulanz-pia-im-josefshaus

Last reminder: Burner Sauna - Zum schwitzenden BÃ¤ren tonight at 6 at Studio DB, Wedding. Donâ€˜t forget to bring a funny â€Wichtel presentâ€œ if you want to take part in the big Wichtel Battle. Also our hots letâ€˜s you know: there will be festive food at a fair price: French cheese, oysters and bubbles.
And not to forget: Agro Yoga for all levels

messages.name: AlexPooPip
messages.content:
Yes, the rumours are true: in 2025 "Zum Brennenden BÃ¤ren" strikes  back!!!
After a three-year hibernation, ZZB (Burning Bear) is backâ€”and this time, itâ€™s double the fun! In 2025, weâ€™re thrilled to bring you two events: a winter burn from March 13â€“16 at the beloved Schloss Beesenstedt ğŸ° and a summer burn in mid-September at our sparkling new treasure ğŸ¤«

â€¼ï¸Yes, we found it: our new homeâ€¼ï¸
Our new location which we will reveal soon is the uncut rough diamond ğŸ’ weâ€™ve spent years searching for! Itâ€™s a place full of history. It has trizillion tons of space to realize our wildest dreams. By 2026 the new location will also be winter-ready, so we plan to make it our winter residency. However, we want to show how colourful, creative and wild we are. This is why we are doing our first event in September and we really need you to join forces.

This project only works if we collaborate like burners do and we are ready to invest a lot of love â¤ï¸ and resources into this project. Soon you will be able to pre-register and start working on whatever project you come up with.
Here are some teasers before the great reveal. An old prison in the basement?! Check! Rooms even more impressive than Beesenstedtâ€™s ballroom!? Check! A lake?! Check! Light-flooded rooms?! Check! We could go on like forever, or in short: weâ€˜re in love ğŸ¥°

Winter is too cold ğŸ¥¶ and September is too far?!
We got you covered. So, whatâ€™s a bear ğŸ» to do in the meantime? Hibernate for another winter? No way! After much thoughtful discussion and a democratic vote, the majority decided: weâ€™re heading back to Schloss Beesenstedt - our cozy but imperfect den under the big chandeliers.
Yes, the reasons we left havenâ€™t changed. Itâ€™s pricey, and not everyone loves the "plug-and-play" vibe. Weâ€™ve heard those voices, loud and clear. But no other venue gives us the creative freedom to make winter magic quite like Beesenstedt. Sure, we said: itâ€˜s over. We said: â€Ciao Cacaoâ€œ and â€last danceâ€œ, but we got an offer we could not refuse.

And be honest: who of you never had sex with their ex?
Letâ€™s work together to make this burn as inclusive as possible.
 Because whether youâ€™re a grizzly ğŸ» , a panda ğŸ¼ , or a teddy ğŸ§¸ , everyone deserves to experience the Burnâ€™s warmth and joy.  The details: Our membership lottery kicks off in the first weeks of January, so donâ€™t waitâ€”sign up now for your membership. The registration form will remain open until December 31st. One last hurrah in Beesenstedt, and thenâ€”onward to new horizons! The adventure is calling, and we canâ€™t wait to share it with all of you. #PawPower is back!

messages.name: kitkatberlin
messages.content:
Special:Â â€PiepShow - Berlin's happiest & most colourful QUEER TECHNO RAVE for everyone who loves to dance in tolerance!â€œ 5 dancefloors, 14 DJs, all areas open, incl. Prisma! Many play-areas & darkrooms throughout the entire club. Drag cabaret floor (performances & comedy) with CoCo Kitsch and Raven Van Krueger. Shibari-Show by Merlin. Veggie buffet, Candy-Shop & Cocktail bar. Shop/Accessoires by Lisa Majun. Colourful decorations & cute piepers everywhere. 14 hours of happy pieping: â€Let's end this year with a PIEP! We can't wait to rave with YOU!â€œ <3

Every Friday & Saturday the â€Come Togetherâ€œ-Preparty @ 8 P.M.
(English version: see down below for the Saturday night)

Liebe GÃ¤ste & Freunde der Nacht!
Seit Juni Ã¶ffnen wir unsere TÃ¼ren am Wochenende bereits um 20 Uhr, auch am Freitag! Von 20 bis 22 Uhr wollen wir leicht & locker in den Abend einsteigen: Freunde treffen, chillen am Pool, Zeit zu plaudern und fÃ¼r ausfÃ¼hrliche GesprÃ¤che. Eine Bar- und StrandatmosphÃ¤re schwebt uns vor: Ein â€Come Togetherâ€œ vor der Party!

Als angenehmen Nebeneffekt erhoffen wir, dass sich die ankommenden GÃ¤ste besser Ã¼ber die Nacht verteilen und sich dadurch die unsÃ¤glichen Wartezeiten in der Schlange elementar verkÃ¼rzen. Oder im besten Fall erst gar keine Schlange entsteht. WÃ¤re das nicht wunderbar?

Aus aktuellem Anlass mÃ¶chten wir euch auch alle bitten, immer daran zu denken, dass es Nachbarn gibt, die Nachts ihre Ruhe wollen. Einige Beschwerden liegen vor, deshalb haben uns die zustÃ¤ndigen Ã„mter kontaktiert. Wir mÃ¼ssen auÃŸerhalb des Clubs definitiv leiser werden, bitte helft uns dabei! Knebel mÃ¶chten wir ungern verteilen. :-)

Der Dresscode gilt selbstverstÃ¤ndlich ab 20 Uhr, ebenso ist der normale Obolus zu entrichten.

Let`s dance & play on!....Eure KitKat-Crew
Dresscode:Â Kinky or fetish (black or colourful), sporty (sportswear + sneakers), creative (sexy + imaginative), costumes. Regular jeans or T-shirts are usually no piep-outfits.

Sa.
28.Â Dez
ab 19h
Tango Rouge at CarneBall Bizarre
(Im 5. Raum, im Basement)
Special:Â 19:00 Entrance Buffet. 19:30 Classes in Argentine Tango: No experience and no partner needed â€“ come alone, as a couple or bring some friends! 2 Classes, Beginners Class: Introduction to Tango. Dramatic & playful figures. 21:30 Tango Party in Salon Rouge. Live music and Performances all night long. Entry from 19:00/Einlass ab 19:00 Uhr. The entry is valid for the whole Saturday night in all areas of KitKatClub.
Dresscode:Â Playful, kinky, fetish, carnival, crazy, sexy, extremely elegant Tango. Casual dress = no entry!

Style:Â Trance, Techno
Special:Â â€Expand your horizon and have a look over the edge. Symbiotikka Goddesses Special. The Wednesday at KitKatClub! Celebrate with us Respect, Freedom, Love and Music! After the overwhelming success of the Symbiotikka Goddesses Parties, letÂ´s celebrate the next edition. Let's celebrate the divine femininity, or female divinity together. 10 female DJs on 3 floors.â€œ

Opening today already at 8 pm! Kinky Shows live, Bondage Show live, Playspace, Bodypainting, Pool, Free Symbiotikka Tattoos and some special surprisesâ€¦

UNITY is a vibrant kinky community of free spirits who seek to connect with their souls and bodies in a respectful, sexy, and playful manner.â€œ Fetish wax and spanking sessions, the opportunity to take your outfit to the next level in our shop, body painting, walking acts, and Sonar Safer-Nightlife. More information and pre-sale tickets.

Special:Â â€Sex-positive und queer-friendly Party Edition - kinky style! (â€¦) Nachspiel the legendary day rave in Berlin at KitKatClub. The Nachspiel at the KitKatClub is a place of tolerance and openness where people of every religion, sexual orientation and identity are welcome. What counts here is the positive energy you bring with you and the willingness to become part of this special community and enrich it with your presence. You are all welcome to celebrate with us in one of the most legendary clubs of Berlin!â€œ Huge chill out areas, Swimming pool.

Our venue, Berlin's legendary KitKatClub, is a sex positive space where everyone can (doesn't have to) explore and express their sexuality without judgement and shame. Needless to say: Consent is always key.
